input: data transaksi yang melakukan penarikan uang atau withdrawal

query: SELECT SUM(`debit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT SUM(`credit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT SUM(`debit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) = (SELECT MONTH(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT SUM(`credit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) = (SELECT MONTH(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT SUM(`amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) = (SELECT MONTH(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT SUM(`amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx)
SELECT COUNT(`debit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND `debit_amount` != 0
SELECT COUNT(`credit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND `credit_amount` != 0

SELECT COUNT(`debit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) = (SELECT MONTH(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND `debit_amount` != 0

SELECT COUNT(`credit_amount`) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) = (SELECT MONTH(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND YEAR(`date`) = (SELECT YEAR(MAX(`date`)) FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx) AND `credit_amount` != 0

input: total akun yang melakukan transaksi keluar
total akun yang melakukan transaksi masuk
berapa total transaksi di bulan mei sampai juni 2022
query: SELECT SUM(`amount`) AS total_transaksi FROM defaultdb.dummy_trx WHERE MONTH(`date`) IN (5, 6) AND YEAR(`date`) = 2022
